alert.note: Alert for Curry County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 17 at 7:15PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN CURRY COUNTY THROUGH 745 PM MDT... At 714 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Saint Vrain, or 13 miles west of Clovis, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clovis, Melrose, Saint Vrain, Ranchvale, Portair and Cannon Air Force Base. This includes Highway 60 between Mile Markers 361 and 382. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. Blowing dust associated with strong thunderstorm winds can reduce visibilities below one quarter mile at times.
